title: Save up to 18% on Sony’s Premium XM5 Headphones with this Deal!
description: Grab them for a much lower price than usual. The post Save up to 18% on Sony’s Premium XM5 Headphones with this Deal! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Grab them for a much lower price than usual.
text: In terms of audio gear, Sony’s premium wireless headphones are among some of the best that you can get right now, and headphones such as the WH-1000XM4 and XM5 are great examples of this. Speaking of the latter, Sony’s current flagship noise cancelling headphones are currently on sale, thanks to this pretty awesome offer on Amazon. In terms of what you get, the XM5 headphones come with a refined design, in addition to signature features such as impressive active noise cancelling, up to 30 hours of playtime with built-in fast charging, support for touch controls, multi-point connectivity, as well as an integrated V1 processor for improved sound. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
In terms of audio gear, Sony’s premium wireless headphones are among some of the best that you can get right now, and headphones such as the WH-1000XM4 and XM5 are great examples of this. Speaking of the latter, Sony’s current flagship noise cancelling headphones are currently on sale, thanks to this pretty awesome offer on Amazon.

In terms of what you get, the XM5 headphones come with a refined design, in addition to signature features such as impressive active noise cancelling, up to 30 hours of playtime with built-in fast charging, support for touch controls, multi-point connectivity, as well as an integrated V1 processor for improved sound. You can check it out using the link below.
